title: GTA San Andreas 2014 lossless repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)

Repack features:

Do not cut / recoded
Precracked - install and play
Install Time - 7minutes
Final size: 4.68gb
Operating system: Win Xp SP2,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit aand 64bit)

Fixed the mouse bug which occured in windows 7,8,8.1. Now u can use mouse during gameplay. All audio (radiostations,cutscenes,speeches) are present.... No black screen on modern pc's .....
[If you still observe any glitches, change the game's compatibility,right click on 'gta_sa' then select properties,select the Compatibility tab and change it with different windows to which it suits]

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided).....

After running setup,,install as usual,, install direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder (optional) play the game from desktop shortcut....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......


LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
